snippet.title: Railway Empire 2 - Nintendo Switch™ Edition | Release Trailer (US)
snippet.description:
Buy now: https://railway-empire2.com/#order
Railway Empire 2 - Nintendo Switch™ Edition is out now on Nintendo Switch™ and is available for purchase from the Nintendo eShop for Nintendo Switch. 

The game is already available with Xbox Game Pass for console and PC Game Pass for PC. It is available on Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One consoles (supported through Smart Delivery). It has also been released on Steam, Epic Games Store, and PlayStation 4|5.

You can get the 3 Official Guides books of Railway Empire 2 digitally via Steam or the BILDNER . The physical versions will be released in June.
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1644320/Railway_Empire_2/
BILDNER Verlag link: https://bildnerverlag.de/a/100641A

Building on the success of its predecessor, Railway Empire 2 - Nintendo Switch™ Edition brings the 60 historically accurate locomotives and immersive gameplay which defined the series, along with new content and expanded features including; improved track construction, a five-chapter campaign, 14 scenarios and free play mode.

*** 

Kalypso Media also publishes critically acclaimed strategy games like the Tropico series, Railway Empire, Commandos, Port Royale, Dungeons, Sudden Strike, and others for PC, PlayStation®, Xbox®, and Nintendo Switch™. Recent releases include Matchpoint – Tennis Championships, Disciples: Liberation, Spacebase Startopia, Port Royale 4, Tropico 6 - Nintendo Switch™ Edition, Commandos 2 - HD Remaster and Praetorians - HD Remaster, Railway Empire - Nintendo Switch™ Edition, and Dungeons 3 - Complete Collection. 

*** 

For even more information, regular live streams, and gameplay from our games, subscribe to our channel Kalypso_live: https://www.youtube.com/c/Kalypso_live 

*** 

Subscribe to our newsletter and receive a 20% discount off your next Kalypso store purchase: https://www.kalypsomedia.com/us/newsletter 

*** 

Want to see more? Stay in touch on our other channels: 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/KalypsoMedia/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/kalypsomedia 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kalypso_media/ 
Website: https://www.kalypsomedia.com 

#RailwayEmpire2 #nintendoswitch  #trains
